name: (C) BTO RDO Air Sealing (Exist)
_description: Targeted cost and performance of commercial air sealing in BTO R&D roadmap
restrict to existing buildings as performance level is inferior to that of the Scout air sealing baseline for new buildings added in or after 2040.

source_data.title: Opaque Envelopes: Pathway to Building Energy Efficiency and Demand Flexibility RDO Report
source_data.author: U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy, Building Technologies Office

installed_cost_source.notes: Based on 10 year payback for given performance levels. Adds lowest incremental cost in roadmap to baseline component costs from Scout baseline cost database.

source_data.title: Opaque Envelopes: Pathway to Building Energy Efficiency and Demand Flexibility RDO Report
source_data.author: U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy, Building Technologies Office

product_lifetime_source.notes: Assumed equal to the lifetime of the building
